movies.description: The Exorcism tells the story of Anthony Miller, an actor who starts acting strangely while working on a horror movie. His daughter Lee notices his odd behavior and fears something evil might be involved. As things get worse, Lee teams up with a priest to save her father from a dark force. The battle against the demon pushes them to their limits, leading to a dramatic exorcism. It's a story about family, faith, and fighting against evil.

The Conjuring follows Ed and Lorraine Warren, paranormal investigators, as they help the Perron family, who are haunted by dark forces in their new farmhouse. Strange events escalate, and the Warrens discover the house is cursed by an evil spirit named Bathsheba. The spirit possesses the mother, Carolyn, and attempts to harm the family. With faith and determination, the Warrens perform an exorcism to save Carolyn and defeat the spirit, restoring peace to the family.

A cursed videotape causes anyone who watches it to die seven days later. Journalist Rachel investigates the mysterious deaths linked to the tape and uncovers the tragic story of Samara, a girl with psychic abilities who was killed by her mother. Rachel discovers the way to survive is by copying the tape and showing it to someone else. The cycle of horror continues as she grapples with the consequences of her actions..

On Halloween night in 1963, six-year-old Michael Myers murders his sister and is institutionalized. Fifteen years later, he escapes and returns to his hometown of Haddonfield to stalk and kill teenagers, including babysitter Laurie Strode. As his psychiatrist Dr. Loomis hunts him, Michael methodically targets his victims with relentless precision. Laurie fights back, narrowly surviving multiple attacks. The film ends with Michael mysteriously vanishing after being shot, leaving his evil presence lingering.

Sinister follows true-crime writer Ellison Oswalt, who moves his family into a house where previous owners were murdered. He discovers disturbing Super 8 films of families being killed, which leads him to uncover a supernatural entity, Bughuul, who consumes children. As Ellison digs deeper, his family becomes ensnared in a terrifying cycle of death.

A married couple’s son, Dalton, falls into a coma after an attic accident. The family experiences paranormal events and learns that Dalton has the ability to astral project, becoming trapped in a supernatural realm called 'The Further.' To rescue him, Josh, his father, must enter The Further and confront demonic entities.

A group of outcast children in the town of Derry, Maine, known as the 'Losers Club,' confronts a shape-shifting entity, Pennywise the Dancing Clown, who preys on their fears. Together, they face terrifying manifestations of their individual worst fears while uncovering the truth about Pennywise's 27-year cycle of feeding on children. They eventually confront Pennywise in his lair beneath an abandoned house, defeat him, and make a blood oath to return as adults if he ever resurfaces.

Four friends visit a haunted mansion in Chennai, where strange occurrences begin to plague them after their visit. They uncover the dark history of the mansion, involving a vengeful spirit and a cursed diamond necklace. As supernatural events intensify, the friends realize they are being targeted by the ghost of Lord John De Monte. With each passing moment, they struggle to escape the curse, leading to their eventual demise.

A woman named Arundhati discovers she is the reincarnation of her great-grandmother Jejamma, who once sacrificed her life to defeat the evil spirit of her cousin, Pasupathi. Pasupathi's spirit, seeking revenge, terrorizes Arundhati's family, forcing her to confront him with the help of a mystical weapon made from Jejamma's bones. Arundhati ultimately sacrifices herself to destroy Pasupathi, but she is later revealed to be Jejamma's reincarnation, ensuring her family’s safety.

A medical student gifts his wife a rare porcelain doll, unknowingly bringing a demonic presence into their home after a violent attack by a cult. As paranormal events escalate, the family must confront the demon that seeks to claim their souls, ultimately leading to a tragic sacrifice. The doll, once thought destroyed, resurfaces in a new home, continuing its cursed existence.

A group of people narrowly escape a deadly accident at a stock car race, only to be hunted down by Death, which relentlessly kills them one by one in increasingly gruesome accidents. After a series of premonitions, Nick O'Bannon and his friends try to evade their fates, but Death's plan remains inevitable. As they attempt to break the cycle, they realize that Death's design cannot be avoided.

In a post-apocalyptic world, a family must live in silence to avoid being hunted by alien creatures that hunt by sound. The Abbott family communicates using sign language and takes extreme precautions to stay quiet. As Evelyn goes into labor, the family faces terrifying new challenges to survive and protect each other.

details.producer: Michael Bay, Andrew Form, Brad Fuller

movies.description: Vasanth, an artist, investigates the vengeful spirit of Maya Matthews, a woman who died in an asylum after murdering her husband. Meanwhile, Apsara, a single mother struggling with financial issues, encounters strange happenings tied to a horror film. As the lines between reality and the supernatural blur, Apsara discovers that Maya is her own mother, and a final deadly encounter ensues.

In 1997, the Butcher, a notorious serial killer, strikes and then vanishes without a trace. Years later, his children are forced to carry on his brutal legacy. They fall deeper into darkness as they embrace his wrath and violent tendencies. Caught in a cycle of carnage, they struggle to escape their father's shadow.

A widower inherits a mansion, only to discover it is haunted by 12 ghosts trapped by a supernatural machine. With the help of a psychic, he must stop the machine and save his children before becoming the 13th ghost himself. The ghosts are freed when the machine malfunctions.

An American film crew travels to Ukraine to investigate tales of cannibalism during the Holodomor. Their séance to summon a spirit unwittingly calls forth the ghost of Andrei Chikatilo, a notorious serial killer, leading to a series of horrifying deaths. Trapped and hunted, the crew faces a gruesome end.

In 1975, the Lutz family moves into a house with a dark history of a mass murder and malevolent spirits. Paranormal events and a sinister possession drive the father to violence, forcing the family to flee after just 28 days. The haunting is linked to a preacher's violent past and the supernatural influence of the house.

details.producer: Michael Bay, Andrew Form, Bradley Fuller

movies.description: In 1977, paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to England to help the Hodgson family, who are plagued by poltergeist activity in their Enfield council home. The Warrens uncover that a demonic entity, Valak, is manipulating the haunting. With Lorraine's faith and knowledge, they confront the demon to save the family.

In 1973 Los Angeles, a social worker and her children are haunted by La Llorona, a malevolent spirit from Latin American folklore. As the curse threatens their lives, they seek the help of a former priest turned shaman to confront the entity. Together, they uncover the spirit's tragic past and battle to break the curse.

details.producer: James Wan, Gary Dauberman, Emile Gladstone

movies.description: a teenage girl, Verónica, conducts a séance with friends during a solar eclipse, unwittingly summoning a dark spirit that attaches itself to her. As paranormal events escalate, she struggles to protect her siblings while uncovering the truth about her possession. Inspired by true events, the story builds to a chilling and tragic conclusion.

details.producer: Apache Films, El Expediente La Película AIE

movies.description: A journalist investigates the mysterious death of a nun during an exorcism in Romania, uncovering dark secrets and confronting her own loss of faith. As she delves deeper, she becomes entangled with the demon responsible, leading to a harrowing fight for her soul. Inspired by the true events of the Tanacu exorcism case.

A dollmaker and his wife, grieving the loss of their daughter, unknowingly unleash a demon through a possessed doll, terrorizing the orphan girls they take in. As one of the girls, Janice, becomes possessed, the terrifying chain of events leads to a dark origin for the Annabelle doll. The story reveals how the demon's search for a human host begins.

A grieving widow, Amelia, struggles with her troubled six-year-old son, Samuel, whose erratic behavior escalates after the discovery of a sinister pop-up book called Mister Babadook. As the mysterious, top-hatted monster begins tormenting their lives, Amelia battles her own sanity while trying to protect her son. The film delves into themes of grief, motherhood, and inner demons, culminating in a haunting confrontation with the Babadook.

The Grudge follows a curse born from a violent death in a Tokyo house, which haunts and kills anyone who encounters it. Karen Davis, an American exchange student, uncovers the terrifying truth as she becomes entangled in the chain of deaths linked to the vengeful spirits. The nonlinear narrative reveals the backstory of the curse and its horrific consequences.

Set in the small town of Woodsboro, 'Scream' follows high school student Sidney Prescott as she and her friends are terrorized by a masked serial killer known as Ghostface. The killer exploits horror film clichés while targeting Sidney, revealing a deeper connection to her past. The film combines suspense, humor, and self-aware commentary on the slasher genre.
